I have the same problem as some of the people here. My game crashed after the selecting of leauges. It crashed at the page where i input my manager's name.

Can anyone pls teach me how to fix it? THANKS! :)

Start -> Control Panel -> Change display language -> Administrative (tab) -> click Change system locale -> choose language ( GERMANY IMPORTANT)-> click OK and restart
After that play the game and save it and back to your region
